EmailTemplate.description: Email sent to requester upon submission of In-Person Hearing request.
EmailTemplate.name: In-Person Hearing Request Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation of Your Request for an In-Person Tow Hearing with the SFMTA
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Greetings. This email confirms your "In-Person" tow hearing is scheduled for {!Case.Date_Hearing_Scheduled__c} at {!Case.Hearing_Time__c}.
The SFMTA Customer Service Center is located at 11 South Van Ness Ave. between Mission and Market Streets (across from SF Honda).
When you arrive, do not wait in line. Check in with the guard, take a seat and wait for the hearing officer to call your name.
Do not park on Mission Street in the afternoon as the location becomes a tow away zone. As always please check for parking restrictions within 100 feet of your vehicle.
Here is your tow hearing Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}. Reference this number should you have questions about your hearing.
Regards,
SFMTA Hearing Section
